rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {AZA1010, AZA1011}

description: The unit examines the nature, sources, types, and characteristics of public policies and explains the complexity of public policy-making. It covers key areas such as the policy-making models, the policy environment and the intersection of policy with politics, as well as the institutional and structural dimensions of the national policy-making process.
